mapper.sql: SELECT S.SHARE_ID, S.SHARE_OPEN, S.SHARE_SHOW, S.SHARE_TITLE, S.SHARE_CONTENT, M.USER_NICK, S.SHARE_CREATE_DATE, S.SHARE_COUNT, S.STATUS FROM SHAREBOARD S JOIN MEMBER M ON(S.SHARE_WRITER_ID = M.ID) WHERE S.STATUS='Y'

mapper.select: AND SHARE_ID = #{shareId} ORDER BY SHAREREPLY_GROUP ASC, R.SHAREREPLY_CREATE_DATE ASC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SHAREBOARD S JOIN MEMBER M ON(S.SHARE_WRITER_ID = M.ID) WHERE S.STATUS='Y'

SELECT S.SHARE_ID, M.USER_NICK AS S_USER_NICK, S.SHARE_OPEN, S.SHARE_SHOW, S.SHARE_TITLE, S.SHARE_CONTENT, S.SHARE_COUNT, S.SHARE_ORIGINAL_FILENAME, S.SHARE_RENAMED_FILENAME, S.SHARE_CREATE_DATE, S.STATUS AS S_STATUS, R.SHAREREPLY_ID, R.SHARE_ID, M2.USER_NICK AS R_USER_NICK, R.SHAREREPLY_GROUP, R.SHAREREPLY_CONTENT, R.SHAREREPLY_CREATE_DATE, R.SHAREREPLY_MODIFY_DATE, R.STATUS AS R_STATUS FROM SHAREBOARD S JOIN MEMBER M ON(S.SHARE_WRITER_ID = M.ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN SHAREREPLY R ON(S.SHARE_ID = R.SHARE_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER M2 ON(R.SHAREREPLY_WRITER_ID = M2.ID) WHERE S.STATUS='Y' AND S.SHARE_ID=#{shareId}
mapper.update: UPDATE SHAREBOARD SET SHARE_COUNT=SHARE_COUNT+1 WHERE SHARE_ID=#{shareId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SHAREBOARD VALUES( SEQ_SHARE_ID.NEXTVAL, #{shareWriteId}, #{shareOpen}, #{shareShow}, #{shareTitle}, #{shareContent}, #{shareOriginalFileName}, #{shareRenamedFileName}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
INSERT INTO SHAREREPLY VALUES ( SEQ_SHAREREPLY_ID.NEXTVAL, #{shareId}, #{shareReplyWriteId}, SEQ_SHAREREPLY_ID.NEXTVAL, #{shareReplyContent}, DEFAULT, SYSDATE, SYSDATE )
